summary: This project enhances MkDocs documentation with AI-driven features, including automatic summary generation and intelligent reading statistics. Key features include support for multiple AI services, multi-language summaries, content cleaning, and efficient caching. It offers intelligent reading statistics like character counting, code detection, and reading time estimation. The tool supports various programming languages, content types, and includes performance optimization and error handling. Installation methods and configuration steps are provided for easy integration into MkDocs projects.
